Class Building

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.reading.dy007252.marcelFevrier.buildingconsole.Building

  • public class Building
extends java.lang.Object
    The building class used to create and manage a building
    Author:
    fevri

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clearBuilding()
      Removes all rooms in currently instantiated within the building.
      int getOccupantRoom()
      gets the index of the room that the occupant is currently within
      boolean getPersonAtDoor() 
      int getXSize()
      Getter for the x size of the building
      int getYSize()
      Getter for the y size of the building
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args) 
      void movePerson()
      moves the occupant one step closer to the door of the room that the occupant is currently within
      void movePersonBetweenRooms()
      moves the person from the room the occupant is currently within to a random location within a random room that is not the room the person is currently within
      void setBuilding(java.lang.String params)
      Instantiates the building using a string of parameters.
      void showBuilding(BuildingInterface bi)
      Imprints the layout (including the outline of the building, the outline of the rooms, and the occupant's location) of the building on the building interface's display layout
      java.lang.String toString()
      Converts the building's properties into one string which can be displayed.

      • clearBuilding

        public void clearBuilding()
        Removes all rooms in currently instantiated within the building.

      • showBuilding

        public void showBuilding(BuildingInterface bi)
        Imprints the layout (including the outline of the building, the outline of the rooms, and the occupant's location) of the building on the building interface's display layout
        Parameters:
        bi - the building interface that the layout will be shown on

      • movePersonBetweenRooms

        public void movePersonBetweenRooms()
        moves the person from the room the occupant is currently within to a random location within a random room that is not the room the person is currently within

      • getOccupantRoom

        public int getOccupantRoom()
        gets the index of the room that the occupant is currently within
        Returns:
        the index (referencing allRooms) of the room the occupant is currently within
